alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hillsborough; Inland Hillsborough (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 21 at 7:35PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL HILLSBOROUGH COUNTY THROUGH 815 PM EDT... At 735 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over East Lake-Orient Park, or near Temple Terrace, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Temple Terrace, Brandon, Fish Hawk, Palm River-Clair Mel, Tampa International Airport, Macdill Air Force Base, East Lake-Orient Park, Egypt Lake-Leto, Greater Carrollwood, Riverview, University, Lake Magdalene, West Park, Busch Gardens, South Tampa, University Of Tampa, Mango, Peter O Knight Airport, and Tampa Executive Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
